Similar to the [[Five-Seal Barrier]] technique, instead the user places three [[sealing tag]]s around their location. If any one manages to enter through a secret entrance of the protected hideout, a deep mist is created and the only way to get rid of it is remove the tags around the protected area.

[[pt-br:Fuuinjutsu do Esconderijo]]
